mapper.insert: INSERT INTO entry_apply_intro(item_no, aply_no, rcrt_no, answer) VALUES (#{itemNo}, #{aplyNo}, #{rcrtNo}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT ESI.RCRT_NO,ESI.ITEM_NAME,ESI.ITEM_EXPL,ESI.MAX_CHAR,EAI.ANSWER FROM entry_sel_intro AS ESI LEFT OUTER JOIN entry_apply_intro AS EAI ON ESI.rcrt_no = EAI.rcrt_no WHERE aply_no = #{aplyNo}
